Title: Ramdhanu: The Rainbow
Writer: Suchitra Bhattacharya (inspired by an original story by), Shiboprosad Mukherjee, Nandita Roy
Actors: Shiboprosad Mukherjee, Rachana Banerjee, Gargi Roy Chowdhury, Kharaj Mukherjee
Plot: Mitali was a worried mother. This time, once again, her 5 year old son Gogol had failed to pass the admission test in a reputed school. Mitali was determined to get her son admitted into a ...
